i1.name: Living Vengeance
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Varus''' gains 20% {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} '''bonus''' attack speed for 5 seconds on non-champion kills, increased to 40% {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} on champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Varus gains 20% (+ 15% bonus attack speed) bonus attack speed for 5 seconds on non-champion kills, increased to 40% (+ 30% bonus attack speed) on champion takedowns.

q1.name: Piercing Arrow
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus''' {{tip|channel|charges}} while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 20% for up to 4 seconds to increase ''Piercing Arrow's'' {{sti|range}} and damage over the first {{fd|1.25}} seconds of the channel. ''Piercing Arrow'' can be recast at any time within its duration.
If the charge completes without reactivation, ''Piercing Arrow'' is canceled, refunding 50% of its {{sti|mana|{{as|mana cost}}}}.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Varus''' fires a piercing arrow in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within its path. The damage of the arrow as well as any detonated {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}} stacks are increased by {{pp|type=channel time|key=%|0 to 50 for 6|0 to 1.25|formula=2% per 0.05 seconds. ''This is capped at 1.25 seconds.''}}, and the arrow's damage is reduced by {{pp|type=enemies hit|key=%|0 to 60 for 5;67|0 to 5|formula=0% + (15% per enemy hit). ''This is capped at a maximum of 67%.''}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Varus charges while being slowed by 20% for up to 4 seconds to increase Piercing Arrow's range and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel. Piercing Arrow can be recast at any time within its duration.
If the charge completes without reactivation, Piercing Arrow is canceled, refunding 50% of its mana cost.
Recast: Varus fires a piercing arrow in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies within its path. The damage of the arrow as well as any detonated Blight stacks are increased by 0 to 1.25 ‒ undefined, and the arrow's damage is reduced by 0 to 5 ‒ undefined.
leveling:
{{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|15/1.5 to 235/1.5|round=2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|125/1.5 to 145/1.5|round=2}}% AD)}}|Minimum Fully Reduced Damage|{{ap|15/1.5*0.33 to 235/1.5*0.33|round=2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|(125/1.5)*0.33 to (145/1.5)*0.33|round=2}}% AD)}}}}
{{st|Maximum Physical Damage|{{ap|15 to 235}} {{as|(+ {{ap|125 to 145|round=2}}% AD)}}|Maximum Fully Reduced Damage|{{ap|15*0.33 to 235*0.33}} {{as|(+ {{ap|125*0.33 to 145*0.33|round=2}}% AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* The arrow missile range is 825 to 1525; The range increases by 140 per {{fd|0.25}} seconds for the first {{fd|1.25}} seconds. Upon reaching its maximum range, it also strikes additional targets in a {{tip|er|icononly = true}} 70 radius, rounding off the struck area.
* The indicator for the range of the spell will be displayed for the entire channel.
* ''Piercing Arrow'' will cast from wherever '''Varus''' is at the end of the channel.
* ''Piercing Arrow's'' damage will display a {{ccs|cosmetic critical strike|physical|link=true|tip=false}} when fully charged.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Varus''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|attack=false|move=true|cast={{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus}} is usable during the first {{fd|0.25}} seconds, otherwise, it's disabled. {{ai|Hail of Arrows|Varus}} and {{ai|Chain of Corruption|Varus}} are disabled. This ability recasts to end channel.|items=false|consume=Disabled, but can still use trinkets.|spells=true, true, false, false, recasts}}
q1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|16 to 10}}|Starts before the channel}}' as '0/14/12/10/8/0' and riot's value '16,14.5,13,11.5,10' as '16/14.5/13/11.5/10'

• Minimum Physical Damage: (+ % AD)
  • Minimum Fully Reduced Damage: (+ % AD)

  • Maximum Physical Damage: (+ % AD)
  • Maximum Fully Reduced Damage: (+ % AD)

w1.name: Blighted Quiver
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Varus'''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and apply a [[stack]] of ''Blight'' for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, refreshing on subsequent applications.

'''Varus' ''' other abilities consume stacks of ''Blight'' on enemies upon damaging them to deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and, if they are a {{tip|champion}} or epic {{tip|monster}}, reduce his basic abilities' cooldowns by 12% of the '''maximum''' cooldown for each stack on the target, up to 36% per target. The '''bonus''' damage is capped at 360 against monsters.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus'''' next {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}} within {{fd|5.5}} seconds deals {{as|{{pp|key=%|changedisplay=true|6 to 14 for 5|1 to 13}} of the target's '''missing''' health}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, increased by {{pp|type=Piercing Arrow's channel time|key=%|0 to 80 for 11|0 to 2|formula=5% per 0.2 seconds. ''This is capped at 2 seconds.''}}, for a maximum of {{as|{{pp|key=%|changedisplay=true|6*1.8 to 14*1.8 for 5|1 to 13}} of the target's '''missing''' health}}. This damage is capped at 360 against monsters. If '''Varus''' is not charging {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}}, ''Blighted Quiver'' can be recast after 1 second for its duration, and does so automatically when its duration ends or '''Varus''' dies within the duration.

''Blighted Quiver'' can be cast during the first {{fd|0.25}} seconds of {{ais|Piercing Arrow|Varus}} charge. ''Blighted Quiver'' is placed on full cooldown even if the charge completes without reactivation or is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Varus''' cancels ''Blighted Quiver'' and places it on a 1 second {{sti|cooldown}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply a stack of Blight for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, refreshing on subsequent applications.
Varus' other abilities consume stacks of Blight on enemies upon damaging them to deal bonus magic damage and, if they are a champion or epic monster, reduce his basic abilities' cooldowns by 12% of the maximum cooldown for each stack on the target, up to 36% per target. The bonus damage is capped at 360 against monsters.
Active: Varus' next Piercing Arrow within 5.5 seconds deals 1 to 13 ‒ undefined of the target's missing health bonus magic damage, increased by 0 to 2 ‒ undefined, for a maximum of 1 to 13 ‒ undefined of the target's missing health. This damage is capped at 360 against monsters. If Varus is not charging Piercing Arrow, Blighted Quiver can be recast after 1 second for its duration, and does so automatically when its duration ends or Varus dies within the duration.
Blighted Quiver can be cast during the first 0.25 seconds of Piercing Arrow's charge. Blighted Quiver is placed on full cooldown even if the charge completes without reactivation or is interrupted.
Recast: Varus cancels Blighted Quiver and places it on a 1 second cooldown.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage per Stack|{{as|{{ap|3 to 5}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health)}}|Maximum Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|9 to 15}}% {{as|(+ 6% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health)}}}}
w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the {{tip|on-hit}} damage but will block the consuming damage if the target is hit by his abilities.
* ''Blighted Quiver's'' active damage is dealt after the damage of {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}}.
* ''Blighted Quiver'' does not count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Blighted Quiver's'' on-hit interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|40|Starts after the effect is used with Piercing Arrow}}' as '40/0' and riot's value '40,40,40,40,40' as '40'

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 25% AP)

• Bonus Magic Damage per Stack: % (+ 2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health
  • Maximum Bonus Magic Damage: % (+ 6% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health

st_slices: % (+ 2% per 100 AP) of the target's '''maximum''' health
% (+ 6% per 100 AP) of the target's '''maximum''' health

e1.name: Hail of Arrows
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus''' fires a hail of arrows at the target location which lands after {{fd|0.5}} seconds, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within the area.
The area then becomes desecrated for 4 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies within and inflicting them with 40% {{tip|Grievous Wounds}}.
''Hail of Arrows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Varus fires a hail of arrows at the target location which lands after 0.5 seconds, dealing physical damage to all enemies within the area.
The area then becomes desecrated for 4 seconds, slowing all enemies within and inflicting them with 40% Grievous Wounds.
Hail of Arrows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
e1.notes:
* {{tip|Slow}} lingers for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after leaving the marked area.
* ''Hail of Arrows'' consumes {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus}} stacks for bonus damage a second time after ~{{fd|0.3}} seconds of hitting, allowing stacks applied during this time to be triggered.

r1.name: Chain of Corruption
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus''' flings out a tendril of corruption in the target direction that infects the first enemy champion hit, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for 2 seconds, during which they are {{tip|sight|revealed}} and inflicted with full stacks of {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}} over the first {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

Upon impact, the tendril roots into the ground from which it seeks out other nearby enemy {{tip|champions}}. If they do not leave the tether's range within 2 seconds, it infects them as well. Tendrils will spread from them again until there are no champions in range that have not already been infected.
''The tendril seeks targets regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Varus flings out a tendril of corruption in the target direction that infects the first enemy champion hit, dealing them magic damage and rooting them for 2 seconds, during which they are revealed and inflicted with full stacks of Blight over the first 1.5 seconds.
Upon impact, the tendril roots into the ground from which it seeks out other nearby enemy champions. If they do not leave the tether's range within 2 seconds, it infects them as well. Tendrils will spread from them again until there are no champions in range that have not already been infected.
The tendril seeks targets regardless of having sight of them or not.
r1.notes:
* Enemy champions can be targeted again by the corruption's tether if they were not infected the previous time, even if they were targeted and got out of range.
* ''Chain of Corruption'' will not infect {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}} targets or those protected by {{tip|spell shield|spell shields}} (but will still seek them).
* '''Varus''' will turn to face the target direction at the start of the cast.
* The tendril cannot seek enemy champions that are {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Chain of Corruption'' will cast from wherever '''Varus''' is at the end of the cast time.
* Consuming the ''Blight's'' stacks applied by ''Chain of Corruption'' will deal bonus magic damage based on {{ais|Blighted Quiver|Varus}} rank. If the ability hasn't been ranked yet, the three ''Blight'' stacks will still be applied but they will be considered to be at rank 0, dealing {{as|{{fd|1.25}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health}} per stack.
